article.Heading: Economists meet Arun Jaitley ahead of Union Budget
article.Summary: The customary pre-Budget consultations are considered important as it helps the government in formulating policies
article.Body:
After banking sector and social group representatives on Tuesday, economists on Wednesday met finance minister Arun Jaitley ahead of the Union Budget.

The customary pre-Budget consultations are considered important as it helps the government in formulating policies.

Mahendra Dev S of IGIDR says there can be some deviation but one has to adhere to fiscal deficit in the medium term. "Agriculture is in a bad shape. Unless we have good monsoon, agriculture growth won't be there. So, there are a lot of suggestions on productivity increase in agriculture. There is a need for push in social sector expenditure, particularly on health."
